璊字的基本解释

璊
mén
玉色赤。

璊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mén］
［《廣韻》莫奔切，平魂，明。］
亦作“玧1”。
赤色的玉。

璊字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　璊； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页741第10
【唐韻】莫奔切【集韻】【正韻】謨奔切【韻會】謨昆切，?音門。【說文】玉䞓色也。禾之赤苗謂之虋，言璊，玉色如之。【詩·王風】毳衣如璊。【傳】璊，赬也。　又【集韻】模元切，音樠。義同。　【類篇】或作玧。亦作㻊。

璊字的起名意思

赤色的玉。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　璊; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 741 No. 10
[Tang Yun] Mo Benqie [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Mo Benqie [Rhyme Meeting] Mo Kunqie,? Yinmen. [Said the text] Yu Cheng Se also. The Chimiao of the He is called the 虋, and the color of jade is like it. 【Poetry·Wang Feng】Luxury clothing is like a treat. [Biography] Reward, get back.　[Jiyun] Modular cut, sound. The same meaning.　[Classes] or as a 玧. Also made 㻊.
